id.description: Unique identifier for the VP request.

lifeTime.description: Lifetime how long the presentation request is valid after creation, in seconds.

dcql_query.description: The DCQL query to be used for the VP request.

registrationCert.description: The registration certificate request containing the necessary details.

webhook.description: Optional webhook URL to receive the response.

redirectUri.description:
Redirect URI to which the user-agent should be redirected after the presentation is completed.
You can use the `{sessionId}` placeholder in the URI, which will be replaced with the actual session ID.

accessCertId.description:
Optional ID of the access certificate to use for signing the presentation request.
If not provided, the default access certificate for the tenant will be used.
